title: Lotus Symphony 1.3 (.deb x86)
description:
IBM Lotus Symphony 1.3
======================
 
A suite of applications for creating, editing and sharing text

IBM Lotus Symphony is a feature-rich set of office tools that are free and easy to use. There are three applications that make up Lotus Symphony: Lotus Symphony Documents, Lotus Symphony Spreadsheets, Lotus Symphony Presentations. 

What's New in This Release:
===========================
Functional enhancements:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled MicrosoftÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Office 2007 files import support.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Significant enhancements in DataPilot in spreadsheets, including show/hide field items panel, drill down to details, DataPilot cache support, and default styles.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Numbering enhancement in documents to improve interoperability with Microsoft Word.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled Microsoft Office and IBM Lotus SmartSuiteÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® password protection support for spreadsheets.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled network URI access and hyperlink support that allows you to create network connection hyperlinks for URI protocols including FTP, MailTo, and SMB.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled envelope support which allows you to create an envelope, set envelope properties, and set printing options.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled Widgets Catalog server support.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved print performance.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled Sumproduct's ForceArray formula support in spreadsheets.

Usability enhancements:
=======================
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· In presentations, page layout is more visible by locating the Properties sidebar in the right panel.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Provided better animation effects interoperability with Microsoft PowerPoint on font-relative effects, fade-exit effects, and multiple motion paths; and enabled the animation play at automatic page transitions.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Provided an automatic cursor in presentation screen shows as a default option.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Presentation pages can be deleted continuously without any prompt.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Provided new graphic bullets and clip art.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Provided enhanced color pallette in color picker.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enhancements in live text.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled support that allows you to open a file by dragging and dropping a file to the home page or the New.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· A continuous improvement in mail merge in documents.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Default font is changed to Arial in presentations and documents.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enlarged the pull-down list length upper limit to 20 items to make more options visible.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enabled Ctrl+left Shift and Ctrl+right Shift hotkey support to switch BIDI layout.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enhanced toolbar and main menu usability.

Programmability enhancements:
=============================
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Provided rich Lotus Symphony document model APIs for Spreadsheets and Documents.

Online help enhancements:
=========================
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Enhanced help content for spreadsheets, common, and preferences topics.

Web site:
=========
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Added drag-to-install function in the Plug-ins section.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Added support for multiple downloads and enabled Atom feeds for clip art and templates in the Gallery section.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Expanded search function for the Forum.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Rotated announcements on the Home page. 



More info : http://symphony.lotus.com/software/lotus/symphony/home.nsf/home
